sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Simpler than electrobinoculars, scanner goggles enhance vision through a blend of light amplification and thermal imaging. They are common in illegal and combat situations, as they do not require extra effort or hands for their operation. Scanner goggles allow the user to see normally in dark conditions.  Models Include: Fabritech X-2000 Scanner Goggles, Torjeka B3, TaggeCo. Luminator.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Scanner Goggles</name> <number>GEAR0001054</number> <price>150</price> <range/> <rarity>3</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 19:09:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e32f1fe02f14a450e0f497eef699b642</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 19:09:07</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
